Package uniandes.cupi2.album.world

Class Album

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniandes.cupi2.album.world.Album

  • public class Album
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the album of football teams.

        public java.util.ArrayList<Team> findTeamsByYear​(int pYear)

      • findTeam

        public int findTeam​(java.lang.String pCountry,
                    int pYear)
        Returns the index of the list for a team given by country and year parameters.
        pre: The list of teams is initialized.
        Parameters:
        pCountry - Country of the team being searched. pCountry != null && pCountry != "".
        pYear - Year in which the searched team represented the country. pYear > 0.
        Returns:
        Index where the searched team is located. -1 if team is not found.

      • findPlayer

        public Player findPlayer​(int pShirtNumber,
                         java.lang.String pCountry,
                         int pYear)
        Returns the player given by shirt number, country, and year parameters.
        Parameters:
        pShirtNumber - Shirt number of the player. pShirtNumber > 0.
        pCountry - Country of the player searched. pCountry != null && pCountry != "".
        pYear - Year in which the searched team represented the country. pYear > 0.
        Returns:
        Player with the given characteristics. Null if player not found.

      • addTeam

        public boolean addTeam​(java.lang.String pCountry,
                       int pYear)
        Adds a team to the album given by country and year parameters.
        pre: The list of teams is initialized.
        post: If a team with the information given by the parameter didn't exist, a new team is added to the list.
        Parameters:
        pCountry - Country of the player searched. pCountry != null && pCountry != "".
        pYear - Year in which the searched team represented the country. pYear > 0.
        Returns:
        True if the team was added, false if the team and country already existed.

      • pasteTeamCard

        public void pasteTeamCard​(java.lang.String pCountry,
                          int pYear)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Pastes team card of the team given by the country and year parameters into the Album.
        pre: The list of teams is initialized. Specified team exists.
        post: The team card was pasted.
        Parameters:
        pCountry - Team's country. pCountry != null && pCountry != "".
        pYear - Year in which the team represented the country. pYear > 0.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the card has already been pasted.

        Throws:

      • changeFavoriteTeam

        public void changeFavoriteTeam​(java.lang.String pCountry,
                               int pYear)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        * Changes the status of favorite for a team card.
        post: If the card was a favorite, it changes to not being a favorite and vice versa.
        Parameters:
        pCountry - Country of the team being searched. pCountry != null && pCountry != "".
        pYear - Year in which the searched team represented the country. pYear > 0.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the team already has the maximum allowed amount of favorite cards. If the team doesn't have a card.

      • changeFavoriteCrest

        public void changeFavoriteCrest​(java.lang.String pCountry,
                                int pYear)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        * Changes the status of favorite for a crest card.
        post: If the card was a favorite, it changes to not being a favorite and vice versa.
        Parameters:
        pCountry - Country of the team being searched. pCountry != null && pCountry != "".
        pYear - Year in which the searched team represented the country. pYear > 0.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the team already has the maximum allowed amount of favorite cards. If the crest doesn't have a card.

      • changeFavoritePlayer

        public void changeFavoritePlayer​(java.lang.String pCountry,
                                 int pYear,
                                 int pShirtNumber)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        * Changes the status of favorite for a player card.
        post: If the card was a favorite, it changes to not being a favorite and vice versa.
        Parameters:
        pCountry - Country of the team being searched. pCountry != null && pCountry != "".
        pYear - Year in which the searched team represented the country. pYear > 0.
        pShirtNumber - Player's shirt number. pShirtNumber > 0.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the team already has the maximum allowed amount of favorite cards. If the player doesn't have a card.

      • modifyPlayer

        public void modifyPlayer​(java.lang.String pCountry,
                         int pYear,
                         int pShirtNumber,
                         int pNewShirtNumber,
                         java.lang.String pName,
                         Player.Position pPosition,
                         int pBirthYear,
                         double pHeight,
                         double pWeight)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Modifies the information of a player given by shirt number, country, and year parameters.
        pre: The list of teams is initialized. Specified team and player exist.
        post: If the shirt number didn't change or a player with the new shirt number didn't exist, the player information was modified.
        Parameters:
        pCountry - Country of the player searched. pCountry != null && pCountry != "".
        pYear - Year in which the searched team represented the country. pYear > 0.
        pShirtNumber - Player's shirt number. pShirtNumber > 0.
        pNewShirtNumber - New shirt number. pNewShirtNumber > 0.
        pName - New player name. pName != null && pName != "".
        pPosition - New player position.pPosition belongs to {Position.GOALKEEPER, Position.DEFENDER,Position.WINGER,Position.STRIKER, Position.UNKNOWN}.
        pBirthYear - Player's birth year. pBirthYear > 0.
        pHeight - New player height. pHeight > 0.
        pWeight - New player weight. pWeight > 0.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the the maximum quantity of goalkeepers on the team has been reached. If the the maximum quantity of defenders on the team has been reached. If the the maximum quantity of strikers on the team has been reached. If there is an attempt to modify a player's shirt number, but the new shirt number already belongs to another player. If there is an attempt to modify a player that already has a card pasted.

      • getMostCommonAge

        public int getMostCommonAge​(java.lang.String pCountry,
                            int pYear)
        Returns the mode of the players' ages given by country and year parameters.
        pre: The list of teams is initialized. Specified team exists.
        Parameters:
        pCountry - Team's country. pCountry != null && pCountry != "".
        pYear - Year in which the team represented the country. pYear > 0.
        Returns:
        Most common age among the players of the searched team.

      • getPercentageCompletenessCardType

        public double getPercentageCompletenessCardType​(Card.CardType pCardType)
        Returns the percentage of cards pasted in the album given by the card type parameter with respect to the total cards of that card type.
        pre: The list of teams is initialized.
        Parameters:
        pCardType - Card type of the card. pCardType belongs to {CardType.CREST, CardType.TEAM, CardType.PLAYER}.
        Returns:
        Percentage of completeness of the cards belonging to the card type received by the parameter.
